availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter Gastell (MO and Lexington, KY carriage dealer)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, carriage dealer. Kentucky native. Married to Sally Gastell. Father of Edwin H Gastell, Fillmore Gastell, Allen Gastell, and Ella Gastell. Carriage dealer in Jackson County, Missouri in 1860. Resident of Lexington in 1862. Laborer in Lawrence County, Indiana, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Missouri, Jackson County, Independence, p. 241.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Lawrence County, IN, June 1863, p. 196.
KYR-0001-004-0055.
